Articles.Content: From what I\'ve heard, since 0.14 it\'s possible to have multiple objects in space and be able to track them. However, none of my rockets stay in space when I return to the Kerban station and check on them using the tracking station. What am I doing wrong?

From what I\'ve heard, since 0.14 it\'s possible to have multiple objects in space and be able to track them. However, none of my rockets stay in space when I return to the Kerban station and check on them using the tracking station. What am I doing wrong?

You\'re probably choosing 'end flight' instead of 'space center'.
I\'ve clicked on both of them and I still get nothing.
Make sure you are in orbit when you press Esc and click 'Space Center.' If you are in the atmosphere or are accelerating, it may not save.
Make sure you are running either 0.14 or 0.14.3 - 14.2 had a bug regarding this issue.
Huh, I guess I was still on 14.2. Everything\'s working now. Thanks.

From what I\'ve heard, since 0.14 it\'s possible to have multiple objects in space and be able to track them. However, none of my rockets stay in space when I return to the Kerban station and check on them using the tracking station. What am I doing wrong?

Make sure you press F5 to save, then go to the tracking station
